content.c_venueAddress: 45 Queen Caroline St, Hammersmith, London W6 9QH
content.name: Shrek The Musical

primaryPhoto.description:
For 6 weeks only the West End and Broadway hit, SHREK THE MUSICAL, returns to London at the Eventim Apollo.
This award-winning musical brings to life the world of Shrek live on stage in an unforgettable production to melt hearts of all ages. Dreamwork’s spectacular musical is based on their much-loved Oscar winning animated film.
From an award-winning creative team and with astonishing visual effects, SHREK THE MUSICAL is a hilarious and heart-warming musical sensation.
Enchantingly irreverent and monstrously clever, SHREK THE MUSICAL is one whirlwind adventure not to be missed.
Don’t miss the magical event of the summer. Book your SHREK THE MUSICAL theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
